'''Liyue''' is a Card Box in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Description==
{{Description|As eternal as the moon, as long-lasting as the rising sun.<br />By earth and hill and bedrock shall all things prosper.|Deck Design Settings Menu}}

==Battle Themes==
Battle Themes during matches are dependent on the Card Box being used. When using '''Liyue''' the following themes are played:
* [[Rapid as Wildfires]]
* [[Chasing the Torrents]]
